roleset.name: form a dimer from two identical dimers

example.name: example with result
example.text: Cleavage of ICAD-L results in the release of CAD, which then homodimerizes to form the active endonuclease that cleaves internucleosomal DNA.
example.arg: the active endonuclease that cleaves internucleosomal DNA

example.name: molecules 1 and 2
example.text: The FKBP12 protein can be homodimerized with FK1012, which consists of two linked molecules of FK506 (Spencer et al., 1993).
example.arg: FK1012, which consists of two linked molecules of FK506
